tool_description: Take a screenshot of any URL. You can also configure various parameters such as width, height, time delay.
name: URL2Screenshot
title: URL2Screenshot

api_list.name: GetDeviceList
api_list.description: Get the list of supported Devices which we can emulate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url2screenshot.p.rapidapi.com/getdevicelist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url2screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://url2screenshot.p.rapidapi.com/getdevicelist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url2screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
